title: [CME: Heart Failure- Overview, Clinical Manifestation, Diagnosis and Management].

abstract: CME: Heart Failure- Overview, Clinical Manifestation, Diagnosis and Management Abstract. Heart failure is one of the most common diseases in internal medicine with estimated more than 10 million patients in Europe. Another 10 million people suffer from myocardial insufficiency without symptoms. Along with injuries and pathologies of the musculoskeletal system, heart failure is one of the most common causes for hospitalization also in Switzerland. This article provides a brief overview of this common disease. Diagnostic tools as well as therapy options will be discussed.
